A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The utter mediocrity of this movie is astounding. Parts were so bad\, it almost broke my heart. Star Wars will forever be my favorite movie franchise\, but I'm afraid Disney has wrapped its claws around it\, and turning it in to the same pomp and circumstance movie with terrible plot lines\, similar to the Transformers-like flicks of modern day. Mark Hamill almost single handedly saves this film with his performance. Lord I hope a large overhaul comes for episode 9. One can only hope.
